Name: reD:起始的旋转之音(The beginning of the Melody)
About the game: The game starts at a normal evening when Mika falls asleep as normal. When he wakes up, he realizes the bedroom has changed dramatically. Is this fantasy? Or real life? Or something else? Exploring the room that should have been familiar, will Mika find something new? Game features -Multiple endings -Short puzzle game -Unique style scene -Indie game reD A confusing proposal could possibly reward gamers with the realization of a dream. People from all over the world participate in this game regardless of any potential risks. The game official prepares trial games which are relevant to their dreams. Our plans are executed simultaneously. Participants would not know any details at all. Before it starts, they would not be informed of any of our plans. The Beginning of the Melody The Initial Spinning Melody The Spinning Melody takes Mika as the main character. It is also the start of reD Plan. The storyline has multiple endings for games to unlock, some of which would potentially influence the following creating of the Second Dimension. PS According to the relevant regulations of steam, the sales card can be launched only after the sales volume reaches a certain amount. The game is the first game of the reD series, and the first practice of the game designer. We wish the game series to become better and better. We hope to create more satisfying games for our gamers. Many thanks for our supporters for their cat food!
